# image_processing

Description.
 
The package package_name is used to:

Processing:

- avarage filter
- Histogram matching
- Structural similarity
- Resize image
	
Utils

- Read image
- Save image
- Plot image

## Installation

Use the package manager [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/) to install package_name

```bash
pip install antonioso_image_processing
```
